web_snippets: James Madden is originally from Wisconsin, and did his graduate work at Kent State (MA, 1998) and Purdue (Ph.D., 2002). Jim Madden has taught at Benedictine ...
Dr. James Madden is Professor of Philosophy at Benedictine College in Atchison, Kansas. He has taught courses in modern philosophy, metaphysics, and philosophy ...
My guest today is Dr James Madden he has taught at Benedictine College in Kansas since 2003 and he's written a number of books.
